thread.title: Life | Watch: NASA's 4k video of coloured water floating in space has us mesmerised
thread.title_full: Life | Watch: NASA's 4k video of coloured water floating in space has us mesmerised - entertainment.ie

author: Jason Brennan
title: Life | Watch: NASA's 4k video of coloured water floating in space has us mesmerised
text:
Space stuff!
We like it. Whether it's movies, themed music, documentaries, or even just videos like this that show what stuff looks like in space, we're on board.
This video, that we got from Mashable , was shot by NASA on the International Space Station. What do they do there? We're not sure to be honest, but judging from this, they only seem to make 4K videos of different food colorings and antacid tablets being added to blobs of weightless water.
Keep up the good work, NASA.
Via Mashable
